maintainer.description: This is my own sandbox overlay. If you have any issues, please contact me via email, or in Jabber (JID is same, as e-mail), or in IRC (Freenode)

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a litte data acquisition tool for the V&A VA18B (chances are that some other mutlimeters (e.g. PeakTech 3375) will be compatible as well.) multimeter connected to a Linux PC via the provided USB optocoupler.
